{"id":411373334,"lang":"python3","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1603263972,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/411373334/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"14.2 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    \n    def myPow(self, x: float, n: int) -> float:\n        # O(logn) time | O(1) space\n        cache = {}\n        def power(a, p):\n            if p not in cache:\n                if p == 0:\n                    ans = 1\n                elif p == 1:\n                    ans = a\n                else:\n                    ans = power(a, p//2) * power(a, p//2) if p % 2 == 0 else a * power(a, p - 1)\n                cache[p] = ans\n            return cache[p]\n        \n        ans = power(x, abs(n))\n        return ans if n >= 0 else 1/ans\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
